metadata.synopsis: Irene (Greer Garson), the wife of the wealthy and materialistic Soames Forsyte (Errol Flynn), is trapped in an unhappy marriage. Determined to find love, she falls for the handsome architect Philip Bosinney (Robert Young), but their affair is further complicated by his engagement to her friend June (Janet Leigh), an extended member of the Forsyte family. When Soames discovers Irene's relationship with Bosinney, it leads to a brutal conflict, setting tragedy into motion.

reviews: It's all done with great dignity, but is immensely stuffy and dull.
